column4: question: Anyone know if Rythembox be installed in kubuntu if so please tell me how its  one/ or what to do.. fairly new to linux (5 days) :D
most users use Amarok in Kubuntu and Rythmbox in Gnome
i know amarok its default for kubuntu
honestly and its only my opinion but Amarok seems better
hmm its all well iif i can find an xchat plugin
so it can work with amrok
does konversation or whichever qt4 irc client for kde support a plugin to Amarok?
no idea just started using xchat
i was in windows most of my time so yeah.
most users using kubuntu use qt4 apps whereas gnome users use gtk apps. It doesnt matter if you wish not to do this but apps like rythmbox/xchat are gtk apps
